successes.title: kraftwerk - highly innovative portable power plant
successes.description: A totally new energy supply technology for mobile electronic devices. Efficient and remains independent from the power grid.

Pledges.description:
A BIG THANK YOU! Every contribution brings kraftwerk one step closer to you. 
We will keep you updated on the progress.
SILVER SPONSOR! Your name will be on our website and we will keep you updated on the progress.

ECO-FRIENDLY PACKAGE! Get 12 cartridges (2,16 lbs) with renewably produced LPG. The LPG is produced by conversion of renewable power to gas (P2G). This means one year of freedom! (compares to 275 full iphone charges).
free shipping

EARLY-BIRD-SPECIAL! Be beyond the first to get kraftwerk. Choose between three different color combinations (urban, outdoor, glam). $70 below the suggested retail price of $149.
free shipping

SAY HELLO TO KRAFTWERK! Be beyond the first to get kraftwerk. Choose between three different color combinations (urban, outdoor, glam). Still $50 below the suggested retail price of $149.
free shipping

GET KRAFTWERK! Some months later but still awesome: Choose between three different color combinations (urban, outdoor, glam). Still $50 below the suggested retail price of $149.
free shipping

FULL PACKAGE! Get kraftwerk in one of the three different color combinations (urban, outdoor, glam). Plus get 12 cartridges (2,16 lbs / 1kg) with renewably produced LPG. The LPG is produced by conversion of renewable power to gas (P2G). 
free shipping

VALENTINE´S DAY SPECIAL
Get two kraftwerk devices with the inscription of your and the name of your loved one in a special gorgeous gift wrapper.
free shipping

ALL GOOD THINGS COME IN THREES! Get three(!) kraftwerk - for you and two of you love ones. Choose between three different color combinations (urban, outdoor, glam). You save 48$.
free shipping
GET IN TOUCH: We'll connect face-to-face, or by phone, skype, whatever... for a 20 minute session with our CEO and CFO to discuss your project, idea or anything else.

GOLD SPONSOR! Get one of the first produced kraftwerk’s ever with a serial number below 1.000 including a certificate. Your Name will be engraved on the device and we will put your name on our website on the gold sponsor section. You can choose between three different color combinations (urban, outdoor, glam).
free shipping

In addition to your own kraftwerk we will send 12 kraftwerk to a non-profit organization focused on disaster relief. After disasters kraftwerk will be needed because the electric grid can breakdown for a long time…
free shipping

PLATINUM SPONSOR! Get one of the first 100 produced kraftwerk’s ever with a serial number below 100 and including a certificate. Your Name will be engraved on the device and we will put your name on our website on the platinum sponsor section. You can choose between three different color combinations (urban, outdoor, glam). Get 2 tickets for the kick-off-Party in Silicon Valley (travel not included).
free shipping

PARTNER PACKAGE! Have a whole day together with the CEO and the CFO. You get a tour through the manufacturing facilities and the research labs and enough time to talk about the integration of our power generator into your application (e-bike, UAV, …) or to get your product into our accessories store or whatever you like. The next day you and your friend visit the October-Fest in Munich, Germany together with the CEO and the CFO.

DISTRIBUTOR PACKAGE! Let us start the dialogue on how we can form a business relationship! On the day you pledge to this reward we´re going to get in contact with you! Personal contact in order to define the next steps of a beneficial partnership with kraftwerk.
